summary_comment: Professor Grágeda is highly regarded for her effective teaching methods and caring approach, ensuring all students understand the material before progressing. She offers low homework loads and flexible virtual attendance options, though prior knowledge of Spanish is recommended due to the specific Quechua dialect covered. Students describe her as exceptionally sweet and understanding, making her a strong recommendation for anyone interested in the subject.
summary_comment_short: Professor Grágeda offers a low-homework, flexible virtual class option and ensures thorough understanding of the material, particularly in Quechua dialects. She is highly recommended for her caring nature and sweet demeanor, providing significant support to her students.

Ratings.comment: Low homework, classes can be attended virtually if needed. Recommended to know some Spanish before taking. You will not be able to find much outside help online, as Quechua has many dialects and this is a specific one. Professor cares about students and ensures that all students understand material before moving on.
Sweetest professor I've had, could not recommend more.
She is so sweet and a really good teacher. She is also very understanding if you need help or if something goes wrong with your homework.
